original_text: I will remove righteous people and wicked people from among you. So I will use my sword to attack everyone in the land, from the north to the south.
korean_text: 내가 의인과 악인을 네게서 끊을 터이므로 내 칼을 칼집에서 빼어 모든 육체를 남에서 북까지 치리니

sentences.original_text: and wicked people from among you
So I will use my sword to attack everyone
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 내 칼을 사용하여 모든 사람을 공격할 것이다

sentences.original_text: from the north to the south
